name: Lithium bromide
desc: Lithium bromide (LiBr) is a chemical compound of lithium and bromine. Its extreme hygroscopic character makes LiBr useful as a desiccant in certain air conditioning systems.
Solubility:
soluble in methanol, ethanol, ether, acetone
slightly soluble in pyridine
Other anions:
Lithium fluoride
Lithium chloride
Lithium iodide
Other cations:
Sodium bromide
Potassium bromide
Rubidium bromide
Caesium bromide
